response.text: In addition, the Sega Claw Machines have Ono Michio and "Robono Michio" statues. ==Related Substories== ===Yakuza 6=== *[[Oh No! It's Ono Michio!]] *[[The Ono Michio Show]] *[[Putting on a Brave Face]] ===Judgment=== *[[The Ono Michio Bandit]] ===Yakuza: Like a Dragon=== *[[The Michio Minefield]] *[[Fauxno Michio (Substory)|Fauxno Michio]] ===Lost Judgment=== *[[The Cafe Robber|The CafÃ© Robber]] ==Trivia== *Ono Michio appears as a DLC character for the [[Clan Creator]] minigame in ''[[Yakuza Kiwami 2]]''. His fighting style is listed as "Dragon of Dojima." A hostess wearing his signature hassaku head named Ono Michiyo is available in [[Cabaret Club Grand Prix]] as DLC. *In Gaiden, an Ono Michio head is an option for the coliseum mask. *Ono Michio's and Robo Michio's head is a costume option in Infinite Wealth, with the "Assorted Outfit Bundle".

{{hr}} <poem> Saenai michikusa Â  Â kirei to hirotta Yasashii senaka ni Â  Â kao wo uzumeta Kaze no fukimawashi Â  Â omikuji no kimagure Mibunfusouou na yume no koibito Akenai yoru ga nai no to onaji ne Samenu yume mo nakute Â  Â awai asu ga kuru Anata to aruita inaka michi Kyou kara hitori de aruku michi Kawaranai fuukei ga Â  Â kirei de yabo ne Yume kara sameta kaerimichi Atetsukeru you na Y-ji ro Susumeba susumu hodo Â  Â hagureteku mirai </poem> {{KaraokeNotice|skip}} <poem> Usuusu saisho kara Â  Â wakatteitanoyo Itsuka wa wakare ga Â  Â yattekuru koto Okiteru tsumori de Â  Â nemutteita no ne Genjitsu to kanchigai nareta shiawase hontou no ai ya unmei wa tabun Towa ni samenu fukai Â  Â yume no koto na no ne Anata no tonari de mita keshiki Kore kara hitori de miru keshiki Kanashisou na yakei ga Â  Â kirei de yabo ne Gaitou mo nai kaerimichi Misukashita you na Y-ji ro Omoeba Omouhodo Â  Â afureteku namida Anata to aruita inaka michi Kyou kara hitori de aruku michi Kawaranai fuukei ga Â  Â itoshikute de yabo ne Yume kara sameta kaerimichi Ishikoro bakari no Winding ROAD Watashi wa susumou Â  hagureteku mirai </poem> {{KaraokeNotice|cont}} <poem> Nido to majiwaru koto naki Y-ji ROAD </poem> {{hr}} ===English Translated Lyrics=== A literal English translation of the lyrics to "Fork in the Road". The lyrics are not intended to be singable and are provided as an alternative translation with stylistic liberties kept to an absolute minimum. {{hr}} <poem> Dull roadside grass, I found it pretty I hid my face in your lovely back By a strange turn of events, by a fortuneâ��s whim A dream lover way out of my league Just as night canâ��t exist without morning Dreams canâ��t exist without waking; pale tomorrow is coming The country road I walked with you on From today itâ��s the road I walk alone The unchanged scenery, once pretty now ugly The road back from this dream seems like a Y-shaped road The more I walk the more our futures diverge </poem> {{KaraokeNotice|skip}} <poem> Haha, of course I knew from the start The day would come when we would part I tried to stay awake but well, I fell asleep Such happiness had to be too good to be true For true love and destiny to coincide Youâ��d have to sleep forever, to have a dream that deep The scenery I looked at beside you From now on itâ��s the scenery Iâ��ll look at alone Itâ��s my unhappiness that turns it from pretty to ugly The road home without you Reveals itself as a Y-shaped road The more I think about it, the more tears fall The country road I walked with you From today itâ��s the road I walk alone The unchanged scenery, equally ugly The road back from this dream Is nothing more or less than a winding road I will walk it, to a different future </poem> {{KaraokeNotice|cont}} <poem> Theyâ��ll never come together again, Y-shaped road </poem> --><ref>https://dojimasdragongirl.wordpress.com/2017/02/12/yakuza-6-karaoke-translation-y-ji-road-y-shaped-road/</ref> == Videos== <gallery> Yakuza 6 - Karaoke Fork in the Road (Sora) </gallery> [[Category:Karaoke]] [[Category:Yakuza 6 Karaoke]] <references /> n5l75ruow69duaedtzx5hjc1s6r7s6n File:ENG Sub KONNANã��ã��ã�ªã��ã�£ï¼� Passionate All Stars Mix (ft. I'll miss you, Kiryu. ----------- â��Playlist YAKUZA 6: THE SONG OF LIFE KARAOKE : https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLjl1ee5g3z1t0vz7TfEXLf2Wq2B7QrTQM -Account Principale: http://www.youtube.com/user/IosonoOtakumanSemper?sub_confirmation=1 -Account Secondario: http://www.youtube.com/user/IosonOtakumanForever?sub_confirmation=1 -TWITCH: http://www.twitch.tv/iosonootakumanlive -FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/Iosonootakuman -TWITTER: https://twitter.com/IosonOtakuman ----------- *PATREON: https://www.patreon.com/IosonoOtakuman *PER DIVENTARE SPONSOR: https://gaming.youtube.com/channel/UCtZ3Zvev_GuN7oryaz67rgA#action=sponsor *DONAZIONI: https://youtube.streamlabs.com/UCtZ3Zvev_GuN7oryaz67rgA *NEGOZIO MAGLIETTE: https://streamlabs.com/iosonootakumansemper/#/merch ----------- [[Category:Videos]] 6ptl3ygo5r9m8yw9k0e055o6twvz7no Hands 0 17931 154675 154674 2024-01-29T04:18:57Z Alexgreg03 53976244 Adding categories 154675 wikitext text/x-wiki {{DISPLAYTITLE:hands}} {{Karaoke |name= hands |image = <gallery> LADG - Karaoke - hands.png|LADG Y6 - Karaoke - hands.png|Y6 </gallery> |game = *[[Yakuza 6]] *[[Like a Dragon Gaiden: The Man Who Erased His Name]] |singer = [[Kazuma Kiryu]] |char = [[Haruto Sawamura]] |location = * [[Touto University Hospital]] (cinematic) *[[Onomichi]] (cinematic) |lyrics = Ryosuke Horii |composition = ZENTA }} '''hands''' is a [[Karaoke|karaoke]] song appearing in [[Yakuza 6]], [[Like a Dragon Gaiden: The Man Who Erased His Name]]'','' and [[Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth]]. It is sung by [[Kazuma Kiryu]] and is not shortened for the minigame.

Kiryu decides to investigate. At Jewel, he once again sees the two men, who are refusing to pay for the club's services, arguing with a blond-haired Jewel employee. Kiryu decides to intervene, telling them that they must pay their bill. The Fake Shinji threatens Kiryu, saying that his friend is the legendary Dragon of Dojima. Kiryu is initially shocked at this, but decides to humour them, and politely requests the Fake Kiryu that they resolve this peacefully. Fake Kiryu however is not interested, and a fight ensues. Afterwards, the employee reveals to the impostors that the man who had just beaten them is the real Kiryu, much to their surprise.

Nishikiyama and Kiryu noticed Yumi coming in to join them. Nishikiyama, Kiryu and Yumi drink before Kiryu falls asleep. When he wakes up, Nishikiyama and Yumi are nowhere to be seen. It's revealed that Nishikiyama is chasing after [[Sohei Dojima|Dojima]] who kidnapped Yumi and took her to the Dojima Family office. Upon seeing Dojima trying to rape Yumi, Nishikiyama shot him in cold blood. Kiryu is alerted by [[Shinji Tanaka|Shinji]] about the commotion and arrives at the office. Nishikiyama tells Kiryu that he would take responsibility but Kiryu volunteers to bear his punishment, so that Nishikiyama could spend time with his dying sister.

Remember that your hand must qualify for at least one Yaku before a win can be declared. With the right tiles it's easiest to use one [[Mahjong#Triplet of Dragons.2C Seat Wind or Prevalent Wind|triplet of dragons, seat wind or prevalent wind]] or [[Mahjong#All Simples .2F Tanyao|All Simples]]* (only suit tiles numbered 2 to 8). Alternatively you could use an [[Mahjong#All Pungs .2F All Triplet Hand|All Pungs]] (four triplets) or [[Mahjong#Half Flush|Half Flush]] hand. The trophy name is a reference to [[Kazuma Kiryu|KiryÅ«]]'s "Dragon of Dojima" title - you're not required to use dragon tiles! <nowiki>*</nowiki>Remember that the [[Mahjong#Kuitan|Kuitan]] rule option must be applied to use All Simples in a hand with steals. '''"Minigame Master" Trophy:''' Meet the completion requirements for all minigames (It's a tough trophy. It's advisable to buy some headache tablets and spare controllers!)

summary.text: Kazuma Kiryu, known as the Dragon of Dojima, is a prominent character in the Yakuza video game series[1]. The moniker "Dragon of Dojima" is associated with Kiryu's formidable fighting style and reputation in the criminal underworld[3]. Throughout the series, Kiryu faces various adversaries and engages in intense battles, showcasing his strength and skills[3][4]. His combat prowess is evident in his confrontations with notable characters like Ryuji, where Kiryu emerges victorious despite the challenges[4]. The title "Dragon of Dojima" symbolizes Kiryu's resilience, honor, and unwavering determination in the face of adversity, making him a central figure in the Yakuza narrative[1].
